tool_description: An API showing up to date sports articles from some of the worlds most popular newspapers
name: current-sportsnews-api
title: current-sportsnews-api

api_list.name: Get Articles By Newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint gets all of the articles from a specified newspaper.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-sportsnews-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/wsj"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-sportsnews-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-sportsnews-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-sportsnews-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Sports News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all of the articles from all of the newspapers in the API
